prepare perfect fennel.
Remove the top, keep it, have a look if there's any marks on the fennel.
Remove it, this is small fennel is this best

remove the part which is tough
you can wash them if you want at this stage or you can make a lovely salad.

This part is a little bit tough.
Cut it, you can braise it in the oven with a little bit of butter

With the tops, select all the green parts this is will go very well with the salad
then with the top, you can use them in a stock
